ResearchProjectDef.label: neolithic tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: A selection of simple tools, knapped or tied together in order to fulfil a rudimentary survival purpose.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: A selection of tools created by any form of -monger, hammered or sharpened into shape for easier use for a medieval colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: industrial tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: With a sufficient enough miniaturisation of batteries and utilisation of electricity, an industrial colony is able to create a selection of tools to speed up a variety of work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spacer tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the advent of space age technology comes a variety of better tools that can be utilised by a spacer colony.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ultratech tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: With more miniaturisation of technology, an ultratech colony is able to utilise a suite of tools to make the day to day labour fly by.
